title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Spontaneous Teaching Strategies for Rural School Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy, understanding of educational assessment, and instructional methodologies
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain two or more flexible instructional design strategies based on learner characteristics.
Learners can propose strategies to address unexpected classroom situations using improvisational teaching methods.
Learners can demonstrate a process for applying assessment data to improve instruction.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
